rows.label: qev055402_MSG0001
rows.name: Nnh...gah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0002
rows.name: Y-you... Have you...come to save me...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0003
rows.name:
Then I am sorry, but...your mission has failed.
The chances of my survival are...zero.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0004
rows.name:
I was dealt an...overwhelming blow from a primordial
creature. Most of my organs have...ruptured.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0005
rows.name: No Orphean could...survive this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_JNK0010
rows.name: Act

rows.label: qev055402_SEL0011
rows.name: Do all that you can to save Kun'luarb.

rows.label: qev055402_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev055402_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Kun'luarb if he found senirapa water.

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0006
rows.name:
No... It is fine. Do not waste your efforts.
Life is a...transient thing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0007
rows.name:
What matters is that I have found a...a drop of
senirapa water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0008
rows.name: Yes...here... A single drop...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0009
rows.name:
I do not mind dying... If I can use this drop to divide,
that is...enough. I will have no regrets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0010
rows.name:
The new lives born of me will...surely find more
senirapa water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_JNK0030
rows.name: Inform

rows.label: qev055402_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Kun'luarb that there is a way to replicate the water.

rows.label: qev055402_JNK0040
rows.name: Support

rows.label: qev055402_SEL0041
rows.name: Watch as Kun'luarb uses the last of the water.

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0011
rows.name:
A method to replenish...senirapa water? On Mira?
Then...then Kon'luarb has done it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0012
rows.name: But...wait...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0013
rows.name:
What of Kon'luarb's research?
He sent you here, did...he not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0014
rows.name: ...What? He perfected a...replication method...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0015
rows.name:
Krgh...nngh... That changes everything.
My own desire to divide is...of no importance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0016
rows.name:
Take this capsule...containing the drop of...
senirapa water...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0017
rows.name: Use it to...populate Mira with Orphe...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0018
rows.name:
Yes... That is the will...of the Ovah.
Th-thank you...[ST:playername ]...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_JNK0050
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev055402_SEL0051
rows.name: Take the water and promise to do as Kun'luarb asks.

rows.label: qev055402_JNK0060
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev055402_SEL0061
rows.name: Insist that Kun'luarb use the water.

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0019
rows.name: G-good... Take it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0020
rows.name:
What you hold in your hands is...the will of the Ovah.
The...future of the Orphe...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0021
rows.name:
See that it reaches...Kon'luarb.
Please, see that it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0022
rows.name: Nngh...gah... My Ovah sounds...so distant...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0023
rows.name:
You are...very kind. And I do wish to...leave behind
new life...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0024
rows.name:
But I must not... I searched all over Noctilum and...
only found this single drop...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0025
rows.name:
Lose that, and...there is no telling where on Mira...more
might be found...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0026
rows.name: Please... Take it. Use it to...save the Orphe...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_JNK0070
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev055402_SEL0071
rows.name: Take the water as Kun'luarb asks.

rows.label: qev055402_JNK0080
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev055402_SEL0081
rows.name: Promise to find more senirapa water yourself.

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0027
rows.name: Good... T-take it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0028
rows.name:
What you hold in your hands is...the will of the Ovah.
The future...of the Orphe...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0029
rows.name:
See that it reaches...Kon'luarb.
Please, see that it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0030
rows.name: Nngh...gah... My Ovah sounds...so distant...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0031
rows.name:
Thank you... I believe that...is what you humans say...
in times like these?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0032
rows.name:
Perhaps seeing you here...once more before the end
is...thanks to the guidance of the Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0033
rows.name: ...I will use the water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0034
rows.name:
I have opened the capsule...
Ovah, receive the water of life...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0035
rows.name:
I am certain senirapa water exists on Mira...
You must...find it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0036
rows.name: Find it and...bring it to Kon'luarb...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0037
rows.name: Gaah! Aaaaaah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0038
rows.name: My Ovah...it divides![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0039
rows.name:
...Hmm? Where am I?
...And you. You are human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0040
rows.name:
I know you, [ST:playername ].
You saved us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0041
rows.name:
[ST:playername ]... Yes, I have heard the
name before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0042
rows.name:
Sin'luarb, hear the voice of the Ovah!
Kun'luarb lives on within us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0043
rows.name: Kun'luarb? Kun'luarb... Yes, we were born of him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0044
rows.name: We are the inheritors of Kun'luarb's Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0045
rows.name: Kun'luarb desired the prosperity of the Orphe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0046
rows.name: He left that task to you, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0047
rows.name:
Newly born as we are, we cannot yet search for
senirapa water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0048
rows.name:
So please honor your promise to Kun'luarb.
Find the water he sought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055402_MSG0049
rows.name:
We will return to Kon'luarb. Do not worry—we know
the way. Or perhaps I should say...we remember it.[ST:wait ]
